comment._content: Dedication of the Christopher Columbus monument at Union Station, Washington, D. C., June 8, 1912. Lorado Taft, sculptor. www.vanderkrogt.net/statues/object.php?webpage=CO&rec...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Note to LOC: June 8 is not Columbus Day . . . .
